name: Sniper - Soldier Mission
description:
Start the life-saving quest being a real sniper on duty – save the hostages from the terrorist’s captivity! Choose the best shooting position to see the mission object clear and be ready to lend your comrades an aerial support! Be careful and attentive, make every bullet reach its right destination and just enjoy the real soldier’s life in Sniper - Soldier Mission game!

Sniper - Soldier Mission features:
• Terrorist neutralize action shooter
• Interesting sniper missions and quests
• Chance to become a real hero of nowadays
• Many unlockable guns and sniper rifles
• Amazing game modes
• Stunning boosters and power-ups
• Thrilling atmosphere made in 3D

Become the most exquisite sniper ever playing our new Sniper - Soldier Mission game and save the world from this horrible terrorist’s threat!
